UserBody.description: User interface used just for create a user

is_private.description:
Always is setting this attribute. Could be setting by user or committe.
Depends on solution configuration

time_in_park.description: Always is setting this attribute. Depends on solution configuration

participation_mode_choosed.description:
If participation is equal to INDIVIDUAL_WITH_COAUTHORSHIP, 
then the valid fields for reading are "author" and "coauthors"
If participation is equal to TEAM,
then the valid field for reading is "team"

challenge.description: Challenge could be undefined if the solution doesn't have a challenge associated

is_private.description: if committee allow to user choose solution privacity

team_name.description: is used if the modality is equal to TEAM

participation.description:
Participation defines the type of intervention 
that the creator chose to make the proposal.
- It can be TEAM: then the creator plus the guests, form a team
- It can be INDIVIDUAL_WITH_COAUTHORSHIP: then the creator will be the author and the guests will be co-authors
the interpretation depends on the value in chosen_mode

externalUser.description: External User. If true is external user that has participation in OpenChallenges

areaVisible.description: Area that is visible for user

points.description: Resume: Points earned for participation in platform.

insertedBy.description:
When the inserted user is not same that author user. 
Used for committe (Committe integrants has 
a Functionality for add generator's challenge)

author.description:
Generator that create the solution. 
This field exclusive with team configuration

coauthor.description:
field that is combined with author 
when participationModeChosen = "INDIVIDUAL_WITH_COAUTHORSHIP"

team.description:
Field that is filled when participationModeChosen = "TEAM"
This field exclusive with author and coauthor configuration

active.description:
Flag that indicate if a solution is active.
When a challenge is delete, the flag is false

WSALevel.description:
WorkSpaceAvailable.
If the situation is available for all company or just for some areas.

areasAvailable.description: Areas available. Is used if WSALevel = AREA because a situation isn't available for all Company. Just for some areas.

groupValidator.description: Group that do the analysis about the situation

status.description: Challenge | Problem | Solution Status: @TODO define situation challenge

fileComplementary.description: Complementary files to challenge, solution or problem

challengeId.description: Id that uniquely identifies a challenge

isStrategic.description: If challenge response to strategic organization need.

timePeriod.description:
TimePeriod that challenge is in a Park for discussion. Dimenention is in hours. 
Then a challenge will be in a park Challenge create + timePeriod

participationMode.description: Participation mode accepted: could be INDIVIDUAL_WITH_COAUTHORSHIP and/or TEAM

insertedBy.description:
When the inserted user is not same that author user. 
Used for committe (Committe integrants has 
a Functionality for add generator's challenge)

author.description:
Generator that create the solution. 
This field exclusive with team configuration

coauthor.description:
field that is combined with author 
when participationModeChosen = "INDIVIDUAL_WITH_COAUTHORSHIP"

team.description:
Field that is filled when participationModeChosen = "TEAM"
This field exclusive with author and coauthor configuration

active.description:
Flag that indicate if a solution is active.
When a challenge is delete, the flag is false

WSALevel.description:
WorkSpaceAvailable.
If the situation is available for all company or just for some areas.

areasAvailable.description: Areas available. Is used if WSALevel = AREA because a situation isn't available for all Company. Just for some areas.

groupValidator.description: Group that do the analysis about the situation

status.description: Challenge | Problem | Solution Status: @TODO define situation challenge

fileComplementary.description: Complementary files to challenge, solution or problem

solutionId.description: Id that uniquely identifies a solution

challengeId.description:
Id that identify the challenge associated. If undefinedn then solution
was an initiative of a generator

challenge.description:
Challenge Object. challengeId refer to challenge attribute. 
The redundace is for performance lookup (for example Solutions with a particular challengeId)

canChooseScope.description:
If true, solution's generator can choose if the 
solution is shared with the community

isPrivate.description:
Solution is shared with the community in the Park.
Is combined with the canChooseScope attribute. 
either obtained from the challenger configuration 
or from the general configuration, it depends on the situation.

participationModeChosen.description: Single value. Election between availables in Challenge.participationMode

filterReactionFilter.description:
variable that indicates if 
the automatic filtering options are enabled in the Park

communityCanSeeReactions.description: The visualization of the occurred reactions can be disabled

filterCanShowDisagreement.description:
If an idea is rejected, those responsible for 
the idea can show disagreement with the result

filterCanFixDesapprovedIdea.description: The user can make corrections to his idea when it is rejected.

timeInPark.description:
TimePeriod that challenge is in a Park for discussion
Is used if isPrivate == false

timeExpertFeedback.description: Time limit that the expert has to give his evaluation

timeIdeaFix.description:
Time limit for those responsible for the idea to 
make a new delivery of the corrected solution.
Is used if filterCanFixDesapprovedIdea == true

ChallengeBody.description:
Data that can be edited or inserted. Other are edited by 
another endpoints

author.description: author is required for a challenge

canChooseScope.description:
Configuration used when a solution is generated. 
It can be with an associated challenge or not.

isPrivate.description:
Configuration used when a solution is generated. 
It can be with an associated challenge or not.
this option is used in combination with `canChooseScope`.

filterReactionFilter.description:
Configuration used when a solution is generated. 
It can be with an associated challenge or not.

filterMinimunLikes.description:
Configuration used when a solution is generated. 
It can be with an associated challenge or not.

filterMaximunDontUnderstand.description:
Configuration used when a solution is generated. 
It can be with an associated challenge or not.

communityCanSeeReactions.description:
Configuration used when a solution is generated. 
It can be with an associated challenge or not.

filterCanShowDisagreement.description:
Configuration used when a solution is generated. 
It can be with an associated challenge or not.

filterCanFixDesapprovedIdea.description:
Configuration used when a solution is generated. 
It can be with an associated challenge or not.

timeInPark.description:
Configuration used when a solution is generated. 
It can be with an associated challenge or not.

timeExpertFeedback.description:
Configuration used when a solution is generated. 
It can be with an associated challenge or not.

timeIdeaFix.description:
Configuration used when a solution is generated. 
It can be with an associated challenge or not.

post.description: Create a new Team for a challenge or situation

Endpoint for add or reeplace a leader of committe.
The new leader have to be a `general commite` user first

Endpoint used for add a new integrant to committe. 
User could be a new integrant or old integrant with active=false
